title: BRIEF-Pilipinas Shell Petroleum Corp Confirms It Is Building An Integrated Energy System
text:
BRIEF-Pilipinas Shell Petroleum Corp Confirms It Is Building An Integrated Energy System

Stock Markets 13 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 17:00)

BRIEF-Pilipinas Shell Petroleum Corp Confirms It Is Building An Integrated Energy System Oct 7 (Reuters) - Pilipinas Shell Petroleum Corp :

* CONFIRMS BUILDING AN INTEGRATED ENERGY SYSTEM TO POWER THE

ELECTRICITY REQUIREMENTS OF ITS REFINERY IN TABANGAO

* UPON COMPLETION, INTEGRATED ENERGY SYSTEM EXPECTED TO

PRODUCE

ABOUT 2,400MW-HOURS OF POWER ANNUALLY

* THE INTEGRATED SOLUTION IS RESULT OF COLLABORATION BETWEEN

CO

AND ROYAL DUTCH SHELL'S NEW ENERGIES BUSINESS

* SHELL INTENDS TO CUT CARBON INTENSITY OF OPERATIONS & OF

ENERGY

PRODUCTS IT SELLS, BY AROUND 20% BY 2035 & AROUND HALF BY 2050



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSXbbs4JB

Further company coverage: SHLPH.PS





BRIEF-Pilipinas Shell Petroleum Corp Confirms It Is Building An Integrated Energy System
